headline.main: Seoul: North Korea Fires 4 Ballistic Missiles Into Ocean
headline.print_headline: Seoul: North Korea Fires 4 Ballistic Missiles Into Ocean

lead_paragraph: North Korea on Monday fired four banned ballistic missiles that flew about 1,000 kilometers (620 miles), with three of them landing in waters that Japan claims as its exclusive economic zone, South Korean and Japanese officials said, in an apparent reaction to huge military drills by Washington and Seoul that Pyongyang insists are an invasion rehearsal.
